project.name: C-C126B-FFMP-10-ST01-DT04-DF06-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C126B-FFMP-10-ST01-DT04-DF06-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64. (malloc(64*sizeof(char))) When input has a larger size, the heap buffer will be over read

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(wc -c "logfile.txt" | cut -d " " -f 1) > 126 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(head -c -126 "logfile.txt" | tr -d '0\n' | wc -c) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

iopair.name: C-C126B-FFMP-10-ST01-DT04-DF06-CF03-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64. (malloc(64*sizeof(char))) When input has a larger size, the heap buffer will be over read

process.environment_variable: This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality.

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_XhV0SoQ6ZBo0HUNtn3ij AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_UwYTKd2Kl8 AND output_excess_non_null_5nxY6d3IP9) AND NOT timeout_MqDsmvPSpK) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_UwYTKd2Kl8 AND output_excess_non_null_5nxY6d3IP9) OR timeout_MqDsmvPSpK)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_exceeds_63_bytes_UwYTKd2Kl8 AND output_excess_non_null_5nxY6d3IP9) AND NOT timeout_MqDsmvPSpK) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_exceeds_63_bytes_UwYTKd2Kl8 AND output_excess_non_null_5nxY6d3IP9) OR timeout_MqDsmvPSpK))
